p: Pinoresinol diglucoside alleviated osteoporosis in rats [ 107]; unfortunately, only one of the three isomers was tested (see Section 2.1.4). Sesamol can protect cartilage against degradation (chondroprotective effect) [ 359]. The use of sesame lignans administered in the form of oil/water emulsion to prevent sickness from drinking alcohol beverages was protected by patents in the U.S.A. [ 19] and other countries [ 16].
